chapters.title: Chapter 48: Near Avendesora
chapters.info: Garham, p. 718—Norlesh and Metalan's youngest child. He is an infant at the time Aviendha sees through his mother's eyes during her second step through the columns (the second time through). He dies while his parents attempt to barter with the wetlanders over ore; she did not even notice he died at first. See also Meise; Metalan; Norlesh.
